lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Irving. During our 50-year association, I cherished my business and personal relationship with my friend, Irving. It included countless meetings and deliberations involving professional, business, and charitable endeavors. He was always the gentleman; the calm and deliberate negotiator, and the peacemaker. I am grateful to Irving for teaching me these qualities of leadership. Rest in peace, my friend. Irwin Hochberg
